entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
